m_szDocTitle: China halves small-car purchase tax as deliveries slow - Chicago Tribune
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- China halves small-car purchase tax as deliveries slow Bloomberg SHANGHAI _ China slashed the purchase tax on smaller cars by half and permitted local governments to spend on speeding up the removal of aging vehicles after industrywide sales trailed the U.S. for the first time in almost six years. The tax cut on cars with engine displacement smaller than 1.6 liters is effective from Oct. 1 through the end of next year, and is part of measures announced Tuesday by the State Council to reduce energy consumption and impact on the environment.
